name: Spirit Rabbit Fur
desc: Fine fur from a rabbit brimming with spirituality, soft and warm texture, suitable for weaving cold-proof clothing

name: Demonic Wolf Fang
desc: Sharp fang from a fierce demonic wolf, containing demonic power, a precious material for forging sharp weapons

name: Qingyun Antler
desc: Jade-like antler from a Qingyun Deer, containing clear spiritual qi, a superior medicinal material for alchemy

name: Shadow Leopard Claw
desc: Sharp claw from a Shadow Leopard, light and agile, can enhance weapon agility

name: Dragon Turtle Shell Plate
desc: Ancient shell plate from an Azure Sea Dragon Turtle, indestructible, containing ocean spiritual power, a top-tier material for armor

name: Mountain Bear Gallbladder
desc: Precious gallbladder from a Stone Armored Bear, can enhance constitution and strength, a precious medicinal material for body cultivators

name: Wind Speed Horse Mane
desc: Flowing mane from a Wind Speed Horse, light as a wind feather, can be used to refine speed-type artifacts

name: Lava Scale
desc: Red scale from a Lava Lizard, high-temperature resistant and containing fire-element spiritual power, a core material for fire-attribute artifacts

name: Poisonous Miasma Sac
desc: Toxin sac from a Poisonous Miasma Frog, containing deadly poison, a rare material for refining poisonous pills

name: Strange Herb Essence
desc: Essence extracted from strange herbs, with magical healing effects

name: Spirit Wood Heart
desc: Precious wood heart of spiritual wood, containing dense spiritual power, a core material for making artifacts

name: Cactus Spine
desc: Spiritual medicinal spine of a desert cactus, can detoxify a hundred poisons, with significant effects when made into injections

name: Snow Lotus Petal
desc: Pure white petal of a Freezing Frost Snow Lotus, containing extreme cold qi, the best choice for cold-attribute medicinal materials

name: Lingzhi Spore
desc: Blue spore of a Water Lingzhi, can enhance spiritual power circulation for water-element practitioners

name: Snowball Flower Stamen
desc: Pure white stamen of a Snowball Flower, with calming and sedative effects, an ideal medicinal material for meditation assistance

name: Ancient Pine Resin
desc: Precious resin from a thousand-year-old pine, crystal clear like amber, containing dense spiritual power, a rare material for high-level artifact refining

name: Spirit Rice Essence
desc: Essence extracted from five-grain spiritual rice, can quickly strengthen constitution, a main ingredient for body cultivation pills

name: Divine Cow Horn
desc: Single horn of an Earth Shaking Divine Cow, containing thick earth power, a top-tier material for refining heavy artifacts and defensive arrays

name: Qingyin Bamboo Joint
desc: The most essential joint of a Nine-Bend Qingyin Bamboo, emitting a calming clear sound when struck, an excellent material for making sound-wave artifacts

name: Ice Spirit Snake Gallbladder
desc: Location of the inner core of an Ice Spirit Bone Snake; although an extremely cold object, swallowing it can greatly enhance a cultivator's affinity for cold qi, a treasure for practicing cold-system techniques

name: Star Pattern Leaf
desc: Grass leaf naturally bearing star patterns on its surface, containing pure star power, a main material for refining star-attribute pills

name: Red Fruit Core
desc: Fruit core of a Nirvana Red Fruit; even if the flesh withers, the core still locks in a trace of indestructible life force, a key for refining longevity pills and supreme healing medicine

name: Black Iron
desc: Common black iron ore, hard texture, suitable for crafting Qi Refinement stage artifacts

name: Red Essence Copper
desc: Completely red copper ore, containing fire spiritual power, a common material for Foundation Establishment stage artifact refining

name: Mithril
desc: Silver-white rare metal, excellent ductility and can conduct spiritual power, suitable for Core Formation stage artifacts

name: Gengjin
desc: Sharp golden ore, indestructible, a top-tier material for Nascent Soul stage natal artifact refining
